scripts.build:frontend: npm run build:js && npm run format:web
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ temp src/vendor/ src/skin/external src/locale/vendor ai-notes/ src/logs/*.log
scripts.composer:install: cd src/ && composer validate --no-check-publish && composer install --no-dev && find vendor -type d \( -name 'tests' -o -name 'Tests' -o -name 'test' -o -name 'docs' -o -name 'examples' -o -name 'example' \) -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.docker:ci:down: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml -f docker/docker-compose.gh-actions.yaml --profile ci down -v
scripts.docker:ci:start: cp docker/Config.php src/Include/Config.php && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml -f docker/docker-compose.gh-actions.yaml --profile ci up -d --build
scripts.docker:dev:login:db: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml --profile dev exec database bash
scripts.docker:dev:login:web: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml --profile dev exec webserver-dev bash
scripts.docker:dev:start: cp docker/Config.php src/Include/Config.php && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml --profile dev up -d
scripts.docker:test: cp docker/Config.php src/Include/Config.php && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml --profile test up -d
scripts.docker:test:reset: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml --profile ci down -v && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml -f docker/docker-compose.gh-actions.yaml --profile ci up -d --build
scripts.docker:test:login:db: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml --profile test exec database bash
scripts.docker:test:login:web: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml --profile test exec webserver-test bash
scripts.docker:test:rebuild: npm run docker:test:down && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml --profile test up -d --build
scripts.docker:test:restart:db: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml --profile test restart database
scripts.docker:test:subdir: cp docker/Config.subdir.php src/Include/Config.php && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml -f docker/docker-compose.subdir.yaml --profile test up -d
scripts.test:ui: cp docker/cypress.config.ts cypress.config.ts && node_modules/cypress/bin/cypress open --e2e --browser chrome
scripts.test:fast: cp docker/cypress.config.ts cypress.config.ts && node_modules/cypress/bin/cypress run --e2e --browser chrome --headed --no-exit
